channel.title: How do you make a quest complete, or just switch to ancient book
channel.description: I want to use ancients but not have to do the quests, is their a command to autocomplete the quest or just change your spell book[br][size=1]Posted on: May 06, 2007, 02:45:32 PM[/size][hr]please somebody I really nned help[br][size=1]Posted on: May 06, 2007, 02:52:43 PM[/size][hr]still really need help[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 12:48:26 AM[/size][hr]grr please I really really want to know

item.title: How do you make a quest complete, or just switch to ancient book
item.dc:creator: @runescapekid runescapekid
item.description:
@runescapekid wrote:

ok too many people ask this thats why i made
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,128818.msg1254048.html#msg1254048

also if that doesn’t work try ::switch
or on some server pray at a chaos altar or
talk to this man just west of bank and training room i can’t remember what npc it is

Read full topic
